name: postwoman-extension
description: Provides more features to the Postwoman webapp (https://postwoman.io/)

scripts.build: npx parcel build src/* --out-dir dist/ && npx copyfiles manifest.json dist && npx copyfiles icons/* dist
scripts.watch: cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp icons/ dist/icons/ && parcel watch src/* --out-dir dist/ --no-hmr

author: Andrew Bastin
